minify-script.description.zh: 混淆代码可以帮助压缩项目的 Javascript 文件，让项目更难被逆向工程，同时也有助于减少需下载的文件大小，改善首次加载时间。
minify-script.description.en: Minifying the script makes the exported project harder to decompile and faster to start.

minify-script.advanced-note.zh: [b]注意：[/b] 在某些情况下，选择 '高级' 混淆模式可能会破坏您项目的 JavaScript 代码，除非您在编写时有专门进行处理。[a1]了解更多[/a1]
minify-script.advanced-note.en: [b]Note:[/b] in some cases 'Advanced' mode can break your project's JavaScript code, unless it is specially written. [a1]Learn more[/a1]

offline-support.description.zh: 离线支持项目保存到本地设备，即使在离线或网络连接有限的情况下，仍然可以在浏览器中加载。[a1]了解更多[/a1]
offline-support.description.en: Offline support saves the project to the local device so it can still load in a browser even when offline or with limited connectivity. [a1]Learn more[/a1]
